answerText: tree rings (prompt on "trees" or "wood" or obvious equivalents)[10] A more common use of tree ring data is to reconstruct this property of the Earth. It is generally agreed that this property has exhibited an upward trend in recent years, largely due to increasing atmospheric carbon dioxide concentrations.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Yale A, OSU A | 2 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name these things from which time-series data are derived using the regional standardization curve method. Historical reconstructions of the Palmer drought severity index are typically performed using these things.
